info.name: Medium Modern Dark
info.description:
Dark mode/style/theme for Medium.com.

Access a better version of this theme on its GitHub repo: https://github.com/CoreyVidal/Medium.com-Modern-Dark
info.additionalInfo:
v1.1.4
Updated tackling of articles, and the homepage if you're not logged in.
Note: userstyles.org won't let allow setting that I need. You should install this style through GitHub instead of here.

Access a better version of this theme on its GitHub repo: https://github.com/CoreyVidal/Medium.com-Modern-Dark
